description: Hearty, smoky and soft burgers with a delicate note of chilli.
name: Black Bean Burger Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium red onion, peeled and diced
4 medium gluten free sourdough kaiser buns, sliced in half

recipeInstructions.text: Empty the black beans into a bowl and drain the liquid, lightly mash with the potato masher.
Combine the rest of the burger ingredients with the mashed beans.
Once the mixture is combine fully, divide into 4 patties and tightly pack together.
Heat up a pan to a medium heat, add the oil and then fry the burgers for 10 minutes, flip over and cook for a further 10 minutes.
Toast your buns for 3 minutes and then serve with the burgers and BBQ sauce and toppings.
